biotools.summary: The rptR package offers easy-to-use functions for estimating R and its uncertainty. The package includes estimates of the repeatability (and also raw variances and marginal R2) for Gaussian traits, binomial and Poisson-distributed traits. The theory for the quantification of the repeatability for non-Gaussian traits.
